titleStmt.title: The merchant a-la-mode. To the tune of Which no body can deny.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Read in White-Fryers, near Fleet-Street,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Attend and prepare for a cargo from Dover ..."
The text printed on one side of each leaf, the third leaf on the verso.
A satire against the Duke d'Aumont and the peace with France.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
